name: Stay.com (EuropaReiser)
overview:
Stay.com lets you discover exciting attractions, restaurants and nightlife by local professionals and build the perfect travel guide together with your friends!

You can create your own personal social city guide, invite your friends to join the same guide, ask your Facebook friends for tips and advice and share your best travel experiences with them. Travellers can even add new places to their guide while they’re travelling - like their friends’ apartment or that cool coffee place they discover by accident. Avoid roaming charges with offline maps.

As featured in Techcrunch, TIME Magazine, Forbes and the New York Times’ travel section.

The brand is 70% owned by Braganza AS, a privately held investment company, owner of Braathens, the leading domestic airline in Norway.

Joachim Paasche, CEO of Stay.com, and his partners at Braganza AS, have extensive experience in the travel business in Scandinavia, the EU and worldwide.
